meanings.definition: A coarse-grained, intermediate intrusive igneous rock consisting of quartz, plagioclase feldspar, and biotite or hornblende.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the granodiorites under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The mountain range is known for its abundance of granodiorites.
meanings.sent3: The granodiorites in the quarry told jokes to the other rocks.
meanings.sent4: The strength of the granodiorites stood firm against the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering granodiorites sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The exhibit showcased various granodiorites from around the world.
meanings.sent2: Miners extracted tons of granodiorites from the quarry.
meanings.sent3: The granodiorites in the museum formed a band and played rock music.
meanings.sent4: The unity of the granodiorites symbolized strength in numbers.
meanings.sent5: The collection of granodiorites displayed a spectrum of colors.
